job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Software Engineer IV, you will work with the seniors of the team, and with Product Managers and Designers and build delightful features and products for our community, as well as the thousands of companies who trust HackerOne with their cybersecurity posture.

   You are a collaborative and effective software engineer and team member. You will interact with CSM's, who are the voice of our customers. You will guide and coach the more junior IC's.

   You'll combine your technological expertise, domain knowledge, and an unquestionable dedication to business objectives as you intersect with the engineering organization. You identify and make systematic improvements to technical weaknesses you'll find in your squad's codebases, and in shared codebases across the company.

   Your Journey at HackerOne
     * Your day will start with a warm welcome online and get your tools to start!
     * Your first 30 days will be focusing on getting to know our HackerOnies. You will join your new squad and being onboarded - get to learn the technology stack (Ruby on Rails + GraphQL + ReactJS + many more)
     * Within 60 days, you will have committed a bunch of code to our repositories and will start developing a knack for being a fast and effective software engineer on our codebase
     * Within 90 days, you will start getting ready to lead your first project as Software Engineer - you will have branched out and talked to Sales, Marketing and various other functions, and developed a good sense of cross-functional collaboration and communication
     * Beyond 90 days, you will be a fully-fledged software engineer
     * By that time you will be able to understand the business value of our products and features, and the needs of our customers
     * And you are able to translate feature requests into simple, but robust engineering (or non-engineering) solutions
job_details.full_text:
Software Engineer IV

As a Software Engineer IV, you will work with the seniors of the team, and with Product Managers and Designers and build delightful features and products for our community, as well as the thousands of companies who trust HackerOne with their cybersecurity posture.

   You are a collaborative and effective software engineer and team member. You will interact with CSM's, who are the voice of our customers. You will guide and coach the more junior IC's.

   You'll combine your technological expertise, domain knowledge, and an unquestionable dedication to business objectives as you intersect with the engineering organization. You identify and make systematic improvements to technical weaknesses you'll find in your squad's codebases, and in shared codebases across the company.

   Your Journey at HackerOne
     * Your day will start with a warm welcome online and get your tools to start!
     * Your first 30 days will be focusing on getting to know our HackerOnies. You will join your new squad and being onboarded - get to learn the technology stack (Ruby on Rails + GraphQL + ReactJS + many more)
     * Within 60 days, you will have committed a bunch of code to our repositories and will start developing a knack for being a fast and effective software engineer on our codebase
     * Within 90 days, you will start getting ready to lead your first project as Software Engineer - you will have branched out and talked to Sales, Marketing and various other functions, and developed a good sense of cross-functional collaboration and communication
     * Beyond 90 days, you will be a fully-fledged software engineer
     * By that time you will be able to understand the business value of our products and features, and the needs of our customers
     * And you are able to translate feature requests into simple, but robust engineering (or non-engineering) solutions

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional software development, collaboration, and business understanding, with no mention of AI, machine learning, generative models, or related technologies. The role is primarily about building and improving software products, not about developing or deploying AI systems.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'understand the business value of our products and features, and the needs of our customers' directly relates to comprehending the business context and customer needs.
job_tasks.phrase: understand the business value of our products and features, and the needs of our customers

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'combine your technological expertise, domain knowledge, and an unquestionable dedication to business objectives' indicates a strong alignment with business goals.
The phrase 'translate feature requests into simple, but robust engineering (or non-engineering) solutions' shows the ability to convert business needs into actionable plans.
job_tasks.phrase: translate feature requests into simple, but robust engineering (or non-engineering) solutions

job_tasks.justification: The core of the job description revolves around building 'delightful features and products' and being a 'fast and effective software engineer on our codebase'.
The mention of committing 'a bunch of code to our repositories' and being a 'fully-fledged software engineer' points to traditional software development activities.
job_tasks.phrase: committed a bunch of code to our repositories

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'identify and make systematic improvements to technical weaknesses you'll find in your squad's codebases' indicates a focus on code quality and maintenance within software development.
job_tasks.phrase: make systematic improvements to technical weaknesses

job_tasks.justification: While not explicitly MLOps, the phrase 'identify and make systematic improvements to technical weaknesses you'll find in your squad's codebases, and in shared codebases across the company' implies a focus on maintaining and improving the quality and robustness of existing systems, which is a component of operations.
job_tasks.phrase: identify and make systematic improvements to technical weaknesses

job_tasks.justification: The description states 'You are a collaborative and effective software engineer and team member' and 'developed a good sense of cross-functional collaboration and communication'.
job_tasks.phrase: collaborative and effective software engineer and team member

job_tasks.justification: The role involves interacting with 'Product Managers and Designers', 'CSM's', 'Sales, Marketing and various other functions', indicating a need for broad communication.
The phrase 'talked to Sales, Marketing and various other functions' highlights the need for cross-functional communication.
job_tasks.phrase: talked to Sales, Marketing and various other functions

job_tasks.justification: The onboarding process described ('first 30 days will be focusing on getting to know our HackerOnies', 'being onboarded - get to learn the technology stack') and the progression milestones ('Within 60 days, you will have committed a bunch of code', 'Within 90 days, you will start getting ready to lead your first project') imply a need for learning and adapting to new environments and technologies.
job_tasks.phrase: get to learn the technology stack

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'translate feature requests into simple, but robust engineering (or non-engineering) solutions' suggests a problem-solving approach focused on creating effective and practical solutions.
job_tasks.phrase: translate feature requests into simple, but robust engineering (or non-engineering) solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'identify and make systematic improvements to technical weaknesses' implies a proactive approach to problem identification and resolution.
job_tasks.phrase: identify and make systematic improvements to technical weaknesses

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'guide and coach the more junior IC's' and 'lead your first project as Software Engineer', indicating a responsibility and initiative-taking aspect of the role.
job_tasks.phrase: guide and coach the more junior IC's

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'lead your first project as Software Engineer' implies taking ownership and driving initiatives.
job_tasks.phrase: lead your first project as Software Engineer
